cause.description:
Fred Dalton Thompson was in DIE HARDER
1. Fred Dalton Thompson will Live Free or Die Hard
2. He will make sure his opponent Dies Harder
3. If he loses, which we hope not, he will run again and Die Hard with a Vengeance
cause.mission: Elect a citizen in any of the Die Hard movies to President
cause.name: Presidential Candidate Fred Dalton Thompson was in DIE HARD 2: DIE HARDER!
